ModulePrefs.title: Google +1 Button
ModulePrefs.author: Alexandro Jimenez
ModulePrefs.description: Google +1 Button so visitors can click and share their +1 with everyone.

Module.Content: <html> <head> <title>+1 demo: Basic page</title> <link rel="canonical" href="http://www.example.com" /> <script type="text/javascript" src="https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js"> </script> </head> <body> <g:plusone size="tall" href="http://www.wavewatchers.org"></g:plusone> </body> </html>
